DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study investigate clinical performance new silicone hydrogel contact lens continuous wear ( 30 night ) period 24 month .
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Clinical Performance Silicone Hydrogel Contact Lenses During Continuous Wear
DOC.criteria: Has oculovisual examination last 2 year . Is correctable least 6/7.5 distance visual acuity eye spherical contact lens . Is current soft contact lens wearer . Has clinically significant anterior eye finding . Has active ocular disease . Has systemic disease might interfere contact lens wear Is use systemic topical medication affect ocular health . Has preexist ocular irritation would preclude contact lens fitting . Has ocular pathology severe insufficiency lacrimal secretion ( dry eye ) would affect wear contact lens . Has undergone corneal refractive surgery . Is pregnant , lactate planning pregnancy .
